name: JunkyardJack
description:
TOP DOWN GTA1-INSPIRED DRIVING GAME

You've done your neighbors wrong!

Drive your truck around the vast junkyard and try escaping the vengeful townsfolk!

Sidenote : I'm currently learning Unity. This is my very first game and it's still in development as of now. That being said, have fun playing and leave a comment if you have any kind of feedback!
